Package com.simulator.model

Class Sensor

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.model.Sensor
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntrywaySensor, MotionSensor
public abstract class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
Abstraction representing a sensor in the home within the simulation (motion, entryway)

      public abstract int pollSensor()
      Have sensor test the entryway for obstructions
      Parameters:
      getName - (
      Returns:
      int an integer representing the triggering of the sensor a return value of 0 means the sensor is not triggered a return value of 1 means the sensor is triggered
